content.en: Aspergillosis diagnosis: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to accurately diagnose invasive pulmonary aspergillosis in critically ill patients. These algorithms are designed to distinguish between colonization and invasive aspergillosis, helping doctors make more precise diagnoses. The studies also explore the effectiveness of different diagnostic criteria and the impact of including fungal biomarkers in the algorithms.
content.da: Aspergillose diagnose: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til nøjagtigt at diagnosticere invasiv pulmonal aspergillose hos kritisk syge patienter. Disse algoritmer er designet til at skelne mellem kolonisering og invasiv aspergillose, hvilket hjælper læger med at stille mere præcise diagnoser. Studierne undersøger også effektiviteten af forskellige diagnostiske kriterier og effekten af at inkludere svampebiomarkører i algoritmerne.
